sakura:PurpleSoulGem.NAME: Purple Soul Gem
DESCRIPTION: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Restart the battle and all enemies deal 20% more damage.

sakura:BlueSoulGem.NAME: Blue Soul Gem
DESCRIPTION: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Take no damage this combat and reduce your Max Health to #r10%. Cannot be used in boss combats. Can only be used twice.
sakura:BlueSoulGem.FLAVOR: I didn’t want this power so I could fight witches. I wanted it so I’d have the strength to do what’s right and protect the ones I love.

sakura:RedSoulGem.NAME: Red Soul Gem
DESCRIPTION: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Gain #y10 Strength. You may no longer use Skills this combat.

FLAVOR: If you live for yourself you’ve only got yourself to blame. So I can’t really blame anyone else and I don’t have any regrets.
